programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;hes forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 2 - Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.

programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with glamping gear, the kids decide they prefer Guys plush method of camping to Branchs insistence on roughing it./Poppys the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep11

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppas house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie / Pups Save Ryder - Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. // Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep201

programme.title: Roundtable : 50 Years Of Malaysia-China Friendship (Rpt)
programme.desc: ROUNDTABLE: 50 Years of Malaysia-China Friendship" is a television special celebrating half a century of diplomatic and economic ties between Malaysia and China. Hosted by Jessy Chahal of BERNAMA TV and Tang Bo of CGTN, the program features insights from four key figures from both countries. They explore the multifaceted relationship, examining past collaborations, current dynamics, and future prospects in trade and cultural exchanges.

programme.title: Roundtable: 50 Years Of Malaysia - China Friendship (Rpt)
programme.desc: ROUNDTABLE: 50 Years of Malaysia-China Friendship" is a television special celebrating half a century of diplomatic and economic ties between Malaysia and China. Hosted by Jessy Chahal of BERNAMA TV and Tang Bo of CGTN, the program features insights from four key figures from both countries. They explore the multifaceted relationship, examining past collaborations, current dynamics, and future prospects in trade and cultural exchanges.

programme.desc: Typhoons in the Northwest Pacific Ocean cause major damage in East Asia. Accurate typhoon predictions are key to limiting that damage. This episode looks at recent advances in typhoon forecasting.

programme.title: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION
programme.desc: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION - Goals, saves and other superhuman feats that have graced the Bundesliga. Since inception in 1963, who stands atop the Bundesliga charts?

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC289NunesvsAldana
programme.desc: Mexico's Irene Aldana challenges Brazils Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289. Plus, its a clash at lightweight as former champ Charles Oliveira battles Beneil Dariush. See the entire main card, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep909UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: Welterweight champion Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman returns to the Octagon to defend his title for the 6th time against familiar foe, Leon Rocky Edwards. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 278.

programme.title: MotoGP - Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP - Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights - Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to Frances significant racing heritage.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Pink Spiders vs Hillstate (3rd game)

programme.title: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION
programme.desc: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION - Goals, saves and other superhuman feats that have graced the Bundesliga. Since inception in 1963, who stands atop the Bundesliga charts?

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Barboza vs. Murphy
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten British sensation Lerone Murphy has won five in a row in the UFC Octagon, but on Saturday, May 18, Manchesters Miracle man will face his toughest test to date in the form of veteran featherweight contender Edson Barboza, as the two collide in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. After a 2023 campaign in which he scored performance bonus-winning victories over Billy Quarantillo and Sodiq Yusuff, Brazils Barboza now has his sights on Murphy, who upped his record to 13-0-1 with two victories of his own last year.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 302: Makhachev vs. Poirier
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant champions in the UFC returns to defend his crown at the Rock on June 2, as UFC lightweight champion Islam Makhachev puts his 13-fight winning streak on the line against Louisiana superstar Dustin The Diamond Poirier in the main event of UFC 302 at the Prudential Center in Newark. New Jersey. Fresh from a stirring knockout of Benoit Saint Denis, Poirier is in prime form heading into his title fight with Makhachev, who owns recent wins over Alexander Volkanovski and Charles Oliveira. Plus, former middleweight champion Sean Strickland begins his road back to the top in a five-round co-feature against Brazilian banger Paulo Costa that will put the winner on the fast track to a crack at the 185-pound title

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep603LockedInWMMADecadeUnbreakableZhangWeiliFighterFocusPolyanaVianaDayOneMayceeBarber
programme.desc: We celebrate a decade of Women in the UFC by looking back at the fighters and moments that make up this decorated history. programme.title: UFC 302: Makhachev vs. Poirier
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant champions in the UFC returns to defend his crown at the Rock on June 2, as UFC lightweight champion Islam Makhachev puts his 13-fight winning streak on the line against Louisiana superstar Dustin The Diamond Poirier in the main event of UFC 302 at the Prudential Center in Newark. New Jersey. Fresh from a stirring knockout of Benoit Saint Denis, Poirier is in prime form heading into his title fight with Makhachev, who owns recent wins over Alexander Volkanovski and Charles Oliveira. Plus, former middleweight champion Sean Strickland begins his road back to the top in a five-round co-feature against Brazilian banger Paulo Costa that will put the winner on the fast track to a crack at the 185-pound title
